Hellgate Wolf Pack can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
[i]Enrage[/i] – Whenever Hellgate Wolf Pack is dealt damage, target opponent sacrifices a creature.
When Hellgate Wolf Pack dies, create three 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens.
